TopicTitle: KSP v0.7 rev1 is up for grabs!

Articles.Content:
The latest version (0.7 rev 1) is up and ready for grabs in the Download section!

This update is a small revision. It contains a few bugfixes and a new feature:

ChangeLog:

Fixes:

* fixed part attachment where a part would not connect to the ship if it were in front of or behind the nearest attach point

* completely rewritten editor camera behaviour. It should be much friendlier now.

New Features:

* New part detail tooltips! Hovering the mouse over any part in the editor's list will display a tooltip with part information.

That's it for now. Stay tuned for new updates this week.

Cheers

Does anyone still [glow=black,2,300]HAVE[/glow]0.7 rev1?

If you do, can you please post the file?

I\'m intrested to see whats changed over the past 3 months.
well as far as i knoow i think everyone is up to date but this website has 0.8 as the farthest one so if ya want here you go http://www.kerbalspacerepository.com/2011/07/17/ksp-version-0-8-0/
